text:
February 20, 1961
Dr. H. Marshall JfcLuhan
29 Wells Hill Avenue
Toronto, Ontario, Canada
Dear Marshalls
I have completely and thoroughly looked through all the files we have
here concerning your Understand Media contract with the Office of
Education. I am enclosing photos of material which I hope will he of
help to you. This is all we have that would possibly be of any use
to you.
I do hope the enclosed will prove to be of some advantage to you.
Best regards.
Sincerely,
hehirs
Harold E, Hill
Enclosures
